This website provides information about the admissions process for a hackathon called TreeHacks. It discusses the criteria used for selecting participants, such as skills, passion, and community background. The site gives insights into the decision-making process and the values of the community. It also mentions resources available for the maker community and the emphasis on mentorship and technical skills for participants. If you are interested in participating in a hackathon and want to know more about the selection process, this website is a good resource for you.
